title: Smoking Sobremesa w/ Steve Saka & Cigar Cartel Podcast
itunes:title: Smoking Sobremesa w/ Steve Saka & Cigar Cartel Podcast
description:
This week we welcome to the studio Steve Saka; the owner of Dumbarton Tobacco & Trust as well as the creator of the much-anticipated release Sobremesa. We will smoke the first blend of the cigar that was not chosen while in the second hour we will smoke the official release and share with you our thoughts.

We also welcome Derek “Acey” Stewart who is one of the founders of the hottest Facebook group devoted to the cigar lifestyle, “Cigar Cartel”.

All this and more on the madness known as The Cigar Authority.
